full_text: 14/n I'd like to thank 🙏  Ted Tseng @TedTsengLab, Joanna Smeeton @smeetonlab, Duc Dong, and Joseph Lancman from @SBPdiscovery, Robert Cerny from @UniKarlova, @USC, @NIDCR funding, everyone @CrumpLab, and of course my supervisor Gage Crump!!! 🎉🎊

7/n In Crump lab we labeled endoderm lineage by sox17:CreERt2 (made by Joseph Lancman and Duc Dong @SBPdiscovery) with 🤝 modified ubi:switch (originally made by @chrmosimann) and combined with cdh1:mlan to label all the epithelia made by @Markrcronan in @TobinLab
@scrippsresearch @ICEgov @salkinstitute @ljiresearch @SBPdiscovery Stay in your lane. Ridiculous political nonsense...
RT @Cosimo_Commisso: Highly recommend watching @PictureaSciFilm, a doc about what it’s like being a woman in science. We had a @SBPdiscover…

Highly recommend watching @PictureaSciFilm, a doc about what it’s like being a woman in science. We had a @SBPdiscovery private online screening this weekend for our DEI initiatives. Every academic institution needs to screen this film!
